docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.
A ServiceLocator implementation for loading and retaining translator objects.
A registry of packages.
docblock.long-description: Unlike many other registries, this one is two layers deep. The first key is a package name, the second key is a locale code, and the value is a callable that returns a Package object for that name and locale.

docblock.description: Tracks whether or not a registry entry has been converted from a callable to a Package object.

tag.description: A callable that returns a package.
